message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $140.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $137.50
I'm still a bit higher than that, how about $132?
I'm still a bit apart, but I'm willing to compromise. How about $135?
I'm still a bit far from my target, how about $130.50?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll meet you at $134
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not willing to go that high. How about $131.25?
I'm not getting any younger, and I really need to make a sale. I'll give you a final offer of $133.50
I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. How about $132.75?
